Here is a bullet list of required elements:

*   Female doll figure, seen from the rear
*   Long, wavy, light brown/blonde hair, seen from the rear, covering the back of the head and upper back
*   Rear section of a light-colored headband
*   Rear view of a red, structured dress bodice
*   Rear view of a long, voluminous, sheer red tulle skirt
*   Rear view of silver, sparkly full-length legwear (tights or leggings), potentially visible through or below the skirt
*   Rear view of silver, pointy-toed high-heeled shoes
*   Solid red background
